settings.text: Item received is defective/damaged/broken/does not work properly.
Item received is different from the description or the product customization information.
The following reasons are covered by our 30 Days FULL Refund/ FREE Replacement Policy. If you are offered a refund or a replacement order, there will be no need to return the received item.
Request for a refund/replacement is after 30 days of product delivery.
Pick the wrong size, product, address, custom information, etc.
Product damaged by misuse, mishandling, or poor maintenance.
Items that have been washed, worn, or soiled and damaged resulting from the customer's handling.
Personal Reasons due to personal taste, change of mind, etc.
Products purchased during a sale or any promotion.

settings.title: No Refund & Replacement
settings.text: The following reasons are NOT covered by our 30 days Refund & Replacement Policy. We are not liable for these issues.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.text: Request Refund/Replacement details with photos of the items you received and the received package's cover including the detailed shipping label to best assist you.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text:
Get Refund or

Replacement after we received your ticket.

settings.title: Refund Time
settings.text: If your refund is approved, the funds are applied to the same payment method that you used to buy the item. Here's how long it takes for a refund to appear on your account or statement:
